CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 26, 1955, pg. A1 reads: "Handsome Pair - Mr. and Mrs. Edward T. Prather following their marriage Nov. 12. The bride is the former Miss Constance Louise Boyd. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of bridal party, including Edward T. Prather light colored bow tie and smiling Constance Louise Prather (Boyd) wearing headpiece with mid length veil, long sleeved gown with floral lace overlay and crinoline skirt, holding book with ribbons and flowers, posed in front of fireplace, in interior, possibly on Dinwiddie Street, Hill District, another version
